info.title: Learnado API
info.description: This is a simple API for an e-learning application

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to perform this action

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to create user account

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to delete

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing user ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete user account

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to suspend

404.description: Not Found - User account not found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to update

requestBody.description: Optional data for updating a user account. At least one field must be provided.

profile_picture.description: Profile picture of the user in specified MIME types

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or validation failure

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to validate

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or other request error

404.description: Not Found - User account not found

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unable to validate user account due to server error

password.description: Minimum length based on configuration, must match password confirmation, and adhere to defined regex

profile_picture.description: Profile picture file, adheres to defined MIME types and max file size

role.description: User role, must be one of the predefined enum values

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Reset token received in the user's email

password.description: New password for the user. Must adhere to defined password rules.

password_confirmation.description: Password confirmation, must match the new password.

message.example: Invalid token or password does not meet criteria.
An error occurred while processing your request.

email.description: User's email address to which the password reset link will be sent.

message.example: Unable to process request due to invalid input.
An error occurred while processing your request.

requestBody.description: Payload to set a new password for a user

password.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid request format or parameters

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to set password

requestBody.description: Refresh token required to obtain a new access token

401.description: Unauthorized, invalid or expired refresh token

500.description: Internal server error, e.g., failed to generate an access token

requestBody.description: Data needed to create a new category

category.description: The name of the category to be created. Must be unique and cannot exceed the maximum string length defined in the configuration.

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing fields

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to create category

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the category to be deleted

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing category ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete category

get.summary: List categories with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by category name

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page for pagination

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to order by

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of sort, either asc or desc

description.example: This course is an introduction to Laravel

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The ID of the course to be deleted

400.description: Bad Request - Incorrect course ID or other request error

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error deleting course

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the course to retrieve

course.description: The course object including details and associated media

description.example: A comprehensive course on Laravel framework

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

get.summary: Get list of users subscribed to a course

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The ID of the course to retrieve subscribed users for

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

get.summary: List all courses with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Filter courses by title

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter courses by category ID

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Filter courses by language ID

parameters.name: is_paid
parameters.description: Filter courses by paid status

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Filter courses by price

parameters.name: discount
parameters.description: Filter courses by discount

parameters.name: teaching_type
parameters.description: Filter courses by teaching type ID

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of courses to return per page

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to order the courses by

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction to order courses (asc or desc)

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The ID of the course to be updated

description.example: This course covers advanced topics of Laravel.

is_paid.description: Indicates if the course is paid

price.description: Price of the course (required if is_paid is true)

message.example: No course found with the provided ID
An error occurred while processing your request.

requestBody.description: Data needed to create a new language

language.description: The name of the language to be created. Must be unique and adhere to maximum length constraints.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description: The ID of the language to delete

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing language ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete language

get.summary: List languages with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Filter by language name

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page for pagination

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to order by

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of sort, either asc or desc

delete.summary: Delete a quiz from a specific step

parameters.name: stepId
parameters.description: The ID of the step from which the quiz will be deleted

400.description: Bad Request - Incorrect step ID or other request error

404.description: Not Found - Step or quiz not found

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error deleting quiz

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

patch.summary: Update a quiz for a specific step

parameters.name: stepId
parameters.description: The ID of the step associated with the quiz to be updated

requestBody.description: Quiz update data including questions and answers

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The ID of the course for which steps are being created

requestBody.description: Data for creating new steps, including optional quizzes and media

media_urls.description: Array of URLs for step-related media

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

delete.summary: Delete a step from a course

parameters.name: stepId
parameters.description: The ID of the step to be deleted

400.description: Bad Request - Incorrect step ID or other request error

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error deleting step

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

get.summary: Get all steps for a specific course

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The ID of the course for which steps are being retrieved

200.description: Successfully retrieved steps for the course

description.example: An overview of the course content

404.description: Course not found or no steps available

message.example: Course not found or no steps available for the specified course
An error occurred while processing your request

patch.summary: Update details of a specific step

parameters.name: step_id
parameters.description: The ID of the step to update

requestBody.description: Step update data including optional fields for media management

media_files.description: Array of new media files to upload

media_to_remove.description: IDs of media to remove from the step

media_urls.description: URLs of new media to be associated with the step

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve

message.example: No user found with the provided ID
An error occurred while processing your request.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter users by first name

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter users by last name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter users by email

parameters.name: PER_PAGE
parameters.description: Number of users per page

parameters.name: ORDER_BY
parameters.description: Attribute to order users by

parameters.name: DIRECTION
parameters.description: Direction of sorting, asc or desc

parameters.name: PAGINATION
parameters.description: Enable pagination (true or false)

requestBody.description: Data for updating the user profile. All fields are optional but at least one should be provided.

password.description: New password for the user account. Must meet the defined complexity requirements.

profile_picture.description: New profile picture for the user.
